pr_title: Sample/Mock Payload Generation for API Inline Prototyping

timeline.message:
Created REST API for generate mocks
Built publisher v1
API and API service had methods added
method implemented in APISERVICEimpl class
Changes made to OAS2Parser and OAS3Parser and OAS3Reader implementation added to APIserviceIMPL
Changes made to OAS2Parser and OAS3Parser and OAS3Reader implementation added to APIserviceIMPL
Changes made to OAS2Parser and OAS3Parser and OAS3Reader implementation added to APIserviceIMPL
all conflicts in publisher yaml resolved
Sample Mock Payload Generation for JSON and XML as Comments along with Payload Variables
conflicts resolved for inline prototyping beta release

timeline.bodyText: Don't use * imports. Use each import individually. You can get help from the IDE to expand this.
timeline.author: malinthaprasan

timeline.bodyText: Add parameter descriptions. Have a look at the other methods.
timeline.author: malinthaprasan
